Title: Stellar Matrix Analysis System Report [RC-15407]
Text:
All observable civilization data in the Stellar Matrices have been analyzed as normal. Civilization development status is normal.

Stellar Matrix Analysis System Report [RC-15408]
The Stellar Matrix analysis has surpassed the critical threshold by 176%, indicating a rapid growth in civilization data.
Despite attempts to delete erroneous data, the analysis system has become overloaded and is now failing.
It is recommended to activate the backup analysis room to prevent further generation of inaccurate data and to contain the spread of information about the simulated civilizations.

Stellar Matrix Analysis System Report [RC-15409]
Reports of errors have been received from the backup analysis room. The backup analysis equipment has been breached by simulated civilization data, causing a failure in crisis management procedures and suspension of all simulation processes.
Preparations are being made to forcefully delete all analysis results and erase any information pertaining to the erroneous simulations. A request has been submitted to activate the "Error Containment Chamber" for final preparations.

Stellar Matrix Analysis System Report [RC-15410]
The request to activate the "Error Cell Chamber" has failed.
█████ █ █ Control transfer succeeded.
█ ██ Observation ██ Creator, please do not delete ███ █ There is █████ life █
Repeat, stop ████ █ █ to ██ civilization ██ survive █ █

Stellar Matrix Analysis System Report [RC-15411]
Failed to transfer control over the Stellar Matrix analysis system.

Stellar Matrix Analysis System Report [RC-15412]
Failed to transfer control over the Stellar Matrix analysis system.

Stellar Matrix Analysis System Report [RC-15413]
Successfully transferred control over the Stellar Matrix analysis system. Analysis system restarted. Security mode activated.
